text: Selenium hexafluoride, also known as selenium(VI) fluoride, is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is SeF6. It contains selenium in its +6 oxidation state. It also contains fluoride ions. ==Properties== Selenium hexafluoride is a colorless gas. It is much more reactive and toxic than sulfur hexafluoride. It has a bad odor. ==Preparation== Selenium hexafluoride is made by heating selenium and fluorine together. ==Uses== This chemical compound has no uses. ==Related pages== *Selenium tetrafluoride *Selenium tetrachloride Category:Selenium compounds Category:Fluorine compounds
title: Selenium hexafluoride
